revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Expand date note. Review corrections and expand annotation.
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)

body.p: its another monday Monday morning and eddEdd and me is alone georgeGeorge has gone to brooklyn Brooklyn and Lou is going to philadelphPhiladelphia i wish you was here with me to day we would have some good strong tea for dinner georgeGeorge has gone to see about getting the brookly Brooklyn work and take out a small sum of money from the bank for the man to begin his house or Lou sLou's as she calls it) i should much like to have somebody to talk with i dont don't hear much but house and money if they could build and keep all the money in the bank it would be good the man is to build it very cheap georgeGeorge thinks he will lose by it

i received your letter saturdaySaturday dear waltWalt i am glad you are improving although slowly it is tedious to stay in so long i know by experience i havent been out except next door in ten weeks this street has been so full of ice and there is quite a quantity of snow in it yet but i shall try to go out soon i have been better of the rheumatism this winter untill until a week or so ago i got quite lame in my knees so i could hardly get down stairs but i think i took cold going out to the privy getting my feet damp as the water stands in the path nearly all the time but every thing must be kept so scientific here i dont don't know sometimes how it is i hope there will never
be any thing to annoy or disturb the manager i think sometims sometimes a person can be to particular Lou aint ain't so nice about any thing but the appearance of the house that seems to be her hobby she has her girls come to see her quite often girls she used to work with they have to all be up here sometimes i dont don't feel like having them but there is no where else for them but in the kichen kitchen we had five here yesterday not all girls but 3 went away but one girl and her beau staid stayed till 10 oclock)

well waltWalt i beleive believe that will doo do for gossip) poor jeffJeff i want to write to him to day but i hardly know what to write to him i have the letter from hattieHattie poor little girls i want
to see them but i dont don't know when i ever shall i dont don't think it would doo do to invite them here to stay) i thought by hattysHatty's letter maybey maybe they dident didn't like their new home but your letter says you think they are satisfied hattieHattie dident didn't say they was dissattisfied dissatisfied but she said the last few weeks seemed like a dream to her of course no place can be like home to them poor matt it seems as if i can hardly realize she is gone as her picture hangs here and looks so much like life it brings the tears to my eyes but i seldom speak of her i think walterWalter dear you and me felt the loss more than any one else except her family of courscourse Jeff feels it more than any one else can but time will asswage assuage in some measur measure if it wasent wasn't for that we couldent couldn't live througthrough our troubles

postscript.p: you must write walterWalter dea dear as often as you can) will you have to get some one to write for you walterWalter or will the work make no difference dont don't worry walterWalter dear
